paragraphs: Embark on an exciting journey with WhoCards and pre-order one of the first 1000 copies. By pre-ordering, you are playing a crucial role in raising the necessary funds to bring the WhoCards to life.
Your action serves as a powerful testament to your belief and support in our mission of sparking meaningful connections and inspiring transformative experiences.
textSections.title: The card deck version of WhoCards is now available for pre-ordering!

paragraphs: When you pre-order a selected number of WhoCards packages, you'll receive a deck for yourself. Plus, you can spread the game's impact by gifting extra decks to others who will benefit from them. Join us in our mission to create more authentic connections and engaging conversations with WhoCards.
textSections.title: Letâ€™s start creating more ripples by gifting WhoCards forward!

paragraphs: We are incredibly grateful for those of you who have been actively sharing the joy of WhoCards within your communities. Your dedication in spreading the transformative power of the game is truly appreciated.
We now invite you to extend your support by sharing the pre-order page with your communities, so more people can experience the magic of WhoCards.
textSections.title: Share the preorder page with your community!
